title: The Modern's Kina Cocktail Recipe
full_text:
The Modern's Kina Cocktail Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
3 mins
Active
3 mins
Total
3 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
gin
1 1/2
ounces
Dolin Blanc
Vermouth
1 1/2
ounces
Cocchi
Americano
1
dash
fino
sherry
Garnish:
Lemon twist
Directions
Fill a mixing glass with ice. Add gin, vermouth, Cocchi Americano, and sherry. Stir until well chilled. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with lemon twist, and serve.
Special equipment
Mixing glass, cocktail strainer
Gin
